bug_report:
1 Minor <></> MacOS Ventura 13.4.1 Chrome 114 [Become a partner] button on 'Our partners' page in [أكثر] ([More]) menu isn't translated when selected langauge is AR
<1>Navigate to capital.com</1> <2>Select AR language</2> <3>Hover over [أكثر] ([More]) menu</3> <4>Click on menu item [شركاؤنا] ([Our partners])</4> The bug is also reproduced for the mobile
[Become a partner] button is translated to AR [Become a partner] button isn't translated to AR ALL ALL https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-9NZu1E58CC2n3l2r1bDMtY6V7-I92Ru/view?usp=sharing @ideear
